title_t: SOS brutalism : a global survey : a collaboration by the Deutsches Architekturmuseum and the Wüstenrot Foundation / edited by Oliver Elser, Philip Kurz, Peter Cachola Schmal ; scientific editing: Felix Torkar, Maximilian Liesner.

compiled_created_t: SOS brutalism : a global survey : a collaboration by the Deutsches Architekturmuseum and the Wüstenrot Foundation / edited by Oliver Elser, Philip Kurz, Peter Cachola Schmal ; scientific editing: Felix Torkar, Maximilian Liesner.
notes_display: Title for the 2-volume set from the container.

Published on the occasion of the exhibition "SOS Brutalismus--Rettet die Betonmonster!" held at the Deutsches Architekturmuseum, Frankfurt am Main, 8 November 2017, and at the Architekturzentrum Wien, Vienna, Austria, 3 May-6 August 2018; includes proceedings of a conference held in Berlin, Germany, in 2012.
